amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete section 103 which prohibits funds in the bill from being used to pay for abortions, except where the life of the mother would be endangered if the fetus were carried to term or in the case of rape.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 103 from the bill. Section 103 prohibits use of funds in the bill to pay for abortions, except where the life of the mother would be endangered if the fetus were carried to term.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeGette amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 253 (Roll no. 235).
